description:
Ren and his partners encounter Yusuke Kitagawa, a young disciple of a well-known painter, Ichiryusai Madarame. Yusuke begs Ann to model for his painting, bewildering the three teens. That weekend, they accept Yusuke`s invitation to visit Madarame`s exhibition. Madarame appears to be a man of integrity, but Ren senses that something is off.
Source: crunchyroll
